Docs.summary: MovingAverageTransform is a weighted average of the values in the sliding window.

Docs.summary:
Possible returns:
Finite Value: no infinite value in the sliding window and at least a non NaN value NaN value: only NaN values in the sliding window or +/- Infinite Inifinite value: one infinite value in the sliding window (sign is no relevant)
